name: zeroorcl

stmt.origin: mptrcl(hs0, c0, czeroo, c1, ccat, cin(cfv(cinito, cv(hs0)), cfv(ctermo, cv(hs0))))
stmt.pretty: mptrcl(hs0, c0, czeroo, c1, ccat, ((InitO ` hs0)⋂(TermO ` hs0)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(czeroo, c1)), wcel(c1, ccat))
-| wceq(czeroo, cmpt(hs0, ccat, cin(cfv(cinito, cv(hs0)), cfv(ctermo, cv(hs0)))))
-| diffsc(hs0, ccat)
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈(ZeroO ` c1)→ c1 ∈ Cat)
⊣ ZeroO =(hs0 ∈ Cat ↦((InitO ` hs0)⋂(TermO ` hs0)))
⊣ d(hs0, Cat)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(czeroo, c1)), wcel(c1, ccat))
-| wceq(czeroo, cmpt(hs0, ccat, cin(cfv(cinito, cv(hs0)), cfv(ctermo, cv(hs0)))))
-| diffsc(hs0, ccat)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈(ZeroO ` c1)→ c1 ∈ Cat)
⊣ ZeroO =(hs0 ∈ Cat ↦((InitO ` hs0)⋂(TermO ` hs0)))
⊣ d(hs0, Cat)

body.origin: |- wceq(czeroo, cmpt(hs0, ccat, cin(cfv(cinito, cv(hs0)), cfv(ctermo, cv(hs0)))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(czeroo, c1)), wcel(c1, ccat))
-| diffsc(hs0, ccat)

comment: Reverse closure for a zero object: If a class has a zero object, the class is a category. (Contributed by AV, 4-Apr-2020.)
